item.title: Michelle add a quote by Joseph Addison
item.description: "Of all the diversions of life, there is none so proper to fill up its empty spaces as the reading of useful and entertaining authors." -- Joseph Addison

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Joseph Addison
item.description: "Reading is to the mind what exercise is to the body." -- Joseph Addison

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Jim Bishop
item.description: "Books, I found, had the power to make time stand still, retreat or fly into the future." -- Jim Bishop

item.title: Michelle add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Theodore Roosevelt
item.description: "Do what you can, with what you have, where you are." -- Theodore Roosevelt

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Bill Keane
item.description: "Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is a gift of God, which is why we call it the present." -- Bill Keane
